participant_1.background:
I have a baby monitor in my nursery so I can hear my child when they wake up.
I have to wear a beanie to play soccer in the cold weather, but I still love it.
I usually wake up and play piano to clear my head before starting the day.
i drive a silver lexus.
i m currently looking for a job in baltimore.

participant_2.background:
I've never been to the west coast, but I really want to go.
i m twenty years old.
i ve an iphone.
I am a stay-at-home mom to my two daughters.
the idea of working is not my cup of tea.

content.text: Hello! I am doing well, thank you for asking. How are you doing today?
I am doing well as well, thank you. I am just getting ready for work.
Oh, what do you do for work?
I am a stay-at-home mom to my two daughters.
Oh, that must be very rewarding! I have two daughters as well, but I am a stay-at-home mom.
That is awesome! I am glad to hear that you are enjoying being a stay-at-home mom.
Thank you! It is very rewarding, but it can also be very challenging.
I can imagine! What are some of the challenges you have faced?
One of the challenges is that I feel like I am always on call. My daughters always need me for something, and it can be hard to get anything done for myself.
I understand. I have had that experience as well. It can be very difficult to find time to do anything for yourself.
Do you have any tips for finding time to do things for yourself?
Yes, I do. One thing I do is to wake up early before my daughters wake up. I use that time to get some things done for myself, like taking a shower, getting dressed, or reading.
That is a great idea! I will have to try that.
Thank you! I appreciate the advice.
